title: aseev
author: aseev
created_time: February 12, 2023, 10:22:50 PMLast edit: March 10, 2023, 02:52:01 PM by aseev
content: Hi,I'm going to periodically post free images in this thread. All images are created by me, are my intellectual property, and aren't taken from somewhere else. You can use them for commercial and noncommercial purposes.Attribution is not required. However, I would appreciate it if you credit the image and include a link to my website. Selling unaltered copies of these images as a poster, print, or on a physical product is prohibited. Don't redistribute or sell the photos on any stock photo or wallpaper platforms.

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: aseev on February 12, 2023, 10:22:50 PMHi,I'm going to periodically post free images in this thread. You can use them for commercial and noncommercial purposes.Attribution is not required. However, I would appreciate it if you credit the image and include a link to my website. Selling unaltered copies of these images as a poster, print, or on a physical product is prohibited. Don't redistribute or sell the photos on any stock photo or wallpaper platforms.It's a good initiative. Thank you for sharing these images for the use of everyone. I hope everyone will use it in a prescribed way and not go against it.But I've a doubt, are you using services such as Evanto to post those images here?, I'm unfamiliar with the t&c of that website so I'm not sure if it's allowed for you to post the images.

comments.author: aseev
comments.created_time: March 10, 2023, 02:46:43 PMLast edit: March 10, 2023, 03:16:59 PM by aseev
comments.body: Quote from: worldofcoins on March 10, 2023, 02:42:04 PMBut I've a doubt, are you using services such as Evanto to post those images here?, I'm unfamiliar with the t&c of that website so I'm not sure if it's allowed for you to post the images. Hi, I'm not just copying images from somewhere else and sharing them here. All images are created by me and are my intellectual property, so I'm not bound by any T&C and can set up my own. Thank you for your comment - it is a good idea to include this information in the main post.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: aseev on March 10, 2023, 04:37:39 PMEmbedding imgur links is not supported in new postsHey aseev, it's ages since you posted your last design here; btw, it contains a link to imgur, which is not supported by the forum, you can learn how to fix it here: TalkImg.com - Image hosting for BitcoinTalk by joker_josue.Aren't you making new designs anymore? Please, let us know and take good care of worldofcoins' advice about T&Cs every time you use any tool or upload images to third party servers: you can always be the author, but you may not be able to monetize your designs in the future if any of them is successful.
